services.title: Building Construction
services.shortDesc: Commercial, residential, and mixed-use buildings delivered with precision and safety.
services.fullDesc: From hotels and commercial centers to residential blocks, we deliver end-to-end building projects. Our team manages structural works, finishes, and MEP coordination to ensure quality, safety, and long-term durability in Djiboutiâ€™s conditions.

services.title: Road & Infrastructure
services.shortDesc: Roads, access paths, and site infrastructure that connect and enable growth.
services.fullDesc: We build reliable transport and site infrastructure including access roads, culverts, and associated civil works. Our approach prioritizes durability, drainage, and long-term maintenance efficiency.

services.title: Water & Sewage Networks
services.shortDesc: Water distribution and sewage networks for sustainable urban growth.
services.fullDesc: We deliver water and sewage infrastructure that improves public health and supports development. Our services include pipeline installation, manholes, and integration with existing networks.

services.title: Metal & Iron Structures
services.shortDesc: Custom steel and iron structures for commercial and industrial facilities.
services.fullDesc: Our fabrication and installation services cover iron ceilings, steel framing, and structural elements. We coordinate with architectural and MEP systems for safe, efficient installations.

services.title: Hangars & Warehouses
services.shortDesc: Large-span structures built for logistics, storage, and operations.
services.fullDesc: We deliver functional hangars and warehouses designed for operational efficiency, clear spans, and heavy-duty use. Projects include foundations, structural steel, and envelope systems.

services.title: Mosque & Religious Works
services.shortDesc: Respectful, detail-oriented construction for religious facilities.
services.fullDesc: We construct mosques and religious facilities with an emphasis on architectural detailing, community needs, and schedule discipline.

services.title: Foundations
services.shortDesc: Reliable foundation systems for multi-building developments.
services.fullDesc: We deliver foundation works for residential, commercial, and multi-lot developments with rigorous QA/QC and schedule coordination.

services.title: Design & Studies
services.shortDesc: Planning, design coordination, and feasibility support for projects.
services.fullDesc: We support clients with feasibility studies, design coordination, and technical assessments to ensure projects are cost-effective, compliant, and buildable.

services.title: Supervision
services.shortDesc: On-site supervision and quality oversight for every stage of construction.
services.fullDesc: We provide dedicated on-site supervision covering daily progress monitoring, safety compliance, workmanship checks, and coordination with contractors and consultants throughout the project lifecycle.

services.title: Surveying
services.shortDesc: Precise land and site surveying using modern instruments and GPS technology.
services.fullDesc: Our surveying team delivers accurate topographic, boundary, and control surveys using total stations, GPS devices, and laser levels. Results feed directly into design and construction planning.

services.title: Consulting
services.shortDesc: Expert technical and financial consulting to guide informed project decisions.
services.fullDesc: We advise clients on project feasibility, risk assessment, budgeting, and technical strategy. Our consultants bring deep industry experience to help stakeholders make sound decisions before and during construction.
